body:
Recently in the last month or so,
I joined the Avicus network.
I love the community and everyone in it.besides Avicus, I love being active, hanging with friends, love bmxing, long boarding, hockey, soccer, playing the piano, making girls laugh, working out
doing stupid stuff at school that gets you in trouble and playing on the Avicus network! I don't know much of computors and stuff but all I know is that mines pretty bad, along with my internet and mouse. I will get a new computor and mouse shortly because I love playing on this server and hope to meet each and everyone of you guys in game! Your friend, Oraporo

title: Hey Avicus, I'm Oraporo

replies.body: Welcome to the forums! Please make sure to read the rules, and have fun! :P

Hey man! 
Welcome! Hope you enjoy your stay (: 

If you have any inquiries, don't hesitate to ask, we're here to help! ;D

Hey dude! Welcome to Avicus!

Feel free to say hi to me in-game and/or join us on plug.dj at plug.dj/avicus!

Hope to to see you in the game!
